price: 93. Sakyk (Muchammedai ﷺ): „Mano Viešpatie, jei Tu man parodytum tai, kuo jiems yra grasinama (kančią),
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
